mapper.select:
select ORDER_ID,MCH_ID,MCH_NAME,TRADE_AMT,ORDER_STATE,ORDER_TIME_STAMP, CORE_SUBMIT_STATE,CORE_SN,SERVICE,ORDER_CORE_RETURN_CODE,ORDER_CORE_RETURN_MSG,ORDER_CORE_RETURN_TIME, order_type,REFUND_ID from( SELECT t.ORDER_ID, t.MCH_ID, t.MCH_NAME, t.TRADE_AMT, t.ORDER_STATE, date_format(t.ORDER_TIMESTAMP,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER_TIME_STAMP, t.CORE_SUBMIT_STATE, t.CORE_SN, t.SERVICE, t.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_CODE, t.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_MSG, t.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_TIME, '1' order_type , '' REFUND_ID FROM td_order t WHERE t.CHANNEL_SUB NOT LIKE 'local.%' and t.ORDER_STATE IN ('00', '90', '91') AND t.CORE_SUBMIT_STATE IN ('04')
AND T.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T.ORDER_TIMESTAMP >= date_format(str_to_date(#{createTimeB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y%m%d000000')
AND T.ORDER_TIMESTAMP <= date_format(str_to_date(#{createTimeE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d'),'%Y%m%d235959')
UNION ALL SELECT
t.ORDER_ID, t.MCH_ID, tor.MCH_NAME, t.REFUND_AMT TRADE_AMT, t.REFUND_STATE ORDER_STATE, t.REFUND_TIME ORDER_TIME_STAMP, t.CORE_SUBMIT_STATE , t.CORE_SN, tor.SERVICE, t.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_CODE, t.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_MSG, t.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_TIME, '2' order_type , t.REFUND_ID FROM td_refund t left join td_order tor on t.ORDER_ID = tor.ORDER_ID WHERE t.REFUND_STATE = '0' AND t.CORE_SUBMIT_STATE IN ('04') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM td_order d WHERE d.ORDER_ID = t.ORDER_ID AND d.CHANNEL_SUB NOT LIKE 'local.%' )
AND T.REFUND_TIME >= str_to_date(#{createTimeB,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND T.REFUND_TIME <= str_to_date(#{createTimeE,jdbcType = VARCHAR} '23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
) a
where order_Type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by ORDER_TIME_STAMP desc
select * , '1' orderType from td_order t where t.CHANNEL_SUB NOT LIKE 'local.%' and t.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select T.REFUND_ID, T.MER_REFUND_ID, T.ORDER_ID, T.MCH_ID merchantCode, T.TOTAL_AMT, T.REFUND_AMT, T.CHANNEL_TRANS_ID, T.CHANNEL_REFUND_ID, T.REFUND_CHANNEL, T.ERR_CODE, T.ERR_DESC, T.REFUND_TIME, T.REFUND_STATE, T.CREATE_TIME, T.CREATE_ID, T.CORE_SUBMIT_STATE, T.CORE_SN, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_CODE, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_MSG, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_TIME, '2' orderType from td_refund t join td_order d on t.ORDER_ID = d.ORDER_ID where t.REFUND_ID = #{refundId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.CHANNEL_SUB NOT LIKE 'local.%'

select T.ORDER_ID, T.MCH_ID, T.MCH_NAME, T.SERVICE,
T.CHANNEL, T.CHANNEL_SUB, T.ZX_ORDER_ID, T.CHANNEL_ORDER_ID,
T.VERSION, T.ORDER_AMT, T.TRADE_AMT, T.COUPON_AMT, T.PROD_DESC, T.PAY_TYPE, T.ORDER_TIMESTAMP, T.ORDER_TIME_OUT, T.ORDER_EXPIRE, T.SIGN_TYPE, T.SIGN_MSG, CASE T.ORDER_STATE WHEN '01' THEN '创建订单' when '02' then '支付处理中' when '00' then '支付成功' when '09' then '支付失败' when '90' then '已退款' when '91' then '部分退款' when '99' then '取消' END as ORDER_STATE, T.NOTIFY_TIME, T.NOTIFY_COUNT, T.NOTIFY_RESULT, T.CREATE_TIME, T.MODIFY_TIME,
T.MODIFY_ID, T.PAYER_CONTACT, T.PAYER_ID, T.FINISH_TIME, T.REFUND_TIME,
T.CORE_SUBMIT_STATE, T.CORE_SN, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_CODE, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_MSG, T.ORDER_CORE_RETURN_TIME, A.merchant_code, B.PAY_CHANNEL_NAME channelSubName, C.PROD_NAME from td_order T left join stcdb.td_cust_info A ON T.mch_id=A.cust_id left join td_pay_channel_cfg B on T.CHANNEL_SUB = B.PAY_CHANNEL_CODE left join td_payment_prod_for_merchant C on T.service = C.PROD_CODE where EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT temp.cust_id FROM stcdb.bms_protocol_content temp WHERE temp.id IN ( SELECT bms.protocol_id FROM stcdb.bms_protocol_column bms WHERE (bms.column_value = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or bms.column_value = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND bms.column_code = 'custManager' ) ) TT WHERE TT.cust_id = T.MCH_ID )
AND T.service like CONCAT('%',#{payProd},'%')
AND T.channel_sub like CONCAT('%',#{payChannel},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(T.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{createTimeB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND #{createTimeE,jdbcType = VARCHAR}>=DATE_FORMAT(T.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND T.order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T.order_state in ('00','90','91')
AND T.channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by CREATE_TIME DESC
